name: As aventuras do Saci-Pererê (The Adventures of Saci-Pererê)
name_original: As aventuras do Saci-Pererê (The Adventures of Saci-Pererê)
description:
A simple platformer game, trying to do as good and old classics. You are the Saci-Pererê, a mythical creature from brazilian folklore, and you must protect the forest against hunters, woodcutters and miners. Enjoy!

Arrows = move the saci

X = jump

Left Mouse = only use in menu screens

PS: This project is not finished yet.
